pred: Yes, rafting can be dangerous, especially when navigating through rapids and strong currents. In the video, a group of people is seen rafting down a river, and they are seen navigating through rapids and strong currents. This requires skill, experience, and proper safety measures to ensure the safety of the rafters. The presence of a life jacket on one of the rafters in the video indicates that they are taking necessary precautions to minimize the risk of injury or drowning. However, it is essential to be aware of the surroundings and follow the guidance of experienced rafters or guides to ensure a safe and enjoyable experience.
